meeting_info.type: Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 29, 2024, Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Action Plans for Implementing Dallas Housing Policy 2033
agenda_items.description: Discussion on action plans for the implementation of the Dallas Housing Policy 2033.

agenda_items.title: Guidance and recommendation on property at 2929 S. Hampton Road
agenda_items.description: Briefing and request for guidance and recommendation to City Council on next steps for the property located at 2929 S. Hampton Road.

agenda_items.title: Department of Housing and Community Development Hubsite and Automated Performance Dashboard
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Hubsite and Automated Performance Dashboard.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions Interim Housing Update
agenda_items.description: Update on upcoming Request For Information for Interim Housing and Services for Unsheltered Adults.

agenda_items.title: Response to Questions from September 23, 2024 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Response to questions posed at the previous Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Fiscal Year 2024-25 Annual Urban Land Bank Demonstration Program Plan
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the 60-day Public Comment Period and Adoption Timeline.

agenda_items.title: Properties Update for various projects
agenda_items.description: Update on projects located at 1950 Fort Worth Avenue, 4150 Independence Drive, 9019 Vantage Point, and 2929 S. Hampton Road.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire Burnett Lofts
agenda_items.description: Authorize the acquisition and development of the Burnett Lofts, a mixed-income, multifamily development.

agenda_items.title: January 22, 2025 City Council Agenda Items related to Paradise Gardens
agenda_items.description: Discussion on public hearing and authorization related to Paradise Gardens affordable multifamily development.

financial_items.description: Proceeds of the Bonds to be loaned to Applicant to finance a portion of the Project related to Paradise Gardens.
